name: WALKING HOME ALONE
description:
Do you dare to walk home alone in the dark? Then prove it!

Walking Home Alone is a short but atmospheric and pulse raising horror game. Your task is simple, to make it home. But who knows what you might meet in the forest?

The beautiful yet dark and scary forest is created in a complementary color scheme of aqua green and red.

✔ Keyboard and mouse

✔ Controller

✔ Complementary color scheme

✔ Disturbing and pulse raising atmosphere.

✔ Horrifying secrets waits in the forest.
